amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that financing for the Systemic Dissolution Fund would come exclusively from assessments on industry, not the American taxpayer.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 33 printed in House Report 111-370 to make explicit that financing for the Systemic Dissolution Fund would come exclusively from assessments on industry, without recourse to the American taxpayer.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kilroy amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
